price: 他〔安拉〕说：“你被贬责地，被弃绝地从这里出去吧！他们中凡是顺从你的，我必以你和他们一起充满火狱。”
arabic: قَالَ ٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا مَذۡءُومٗا مَّدۡحُورٗاۖ لَّمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla ukh'ruj min'hā madhūman madḥūran laman tabiʿaka min'hum la-amla-anna jahannama minkum ajmaʿīna
